Write-Up Text: People have been buzzing over the Federal Budget announcements that will have far-reaching effects on renters homeowners and healthcare. The Commonwealth Rent Assistance program has received the most significant increase in over 30 years and the Home Guarantee Scheme will now include more criteria for first-home buyers. Those suffering from chronic health conditions will benefit from cheaper medicines while those on income support will receive job help. Multiple positive updates to aged care small business incentives and veteran support have also been announced. The budget has been met with both praise and criticism from people across the country.
